website_summaries.verdict: Very breathable, making this cleat perfect for warm weather games and practices.
pros: Breathable, lightweight upper and mesh tongue allow air to easily reach the foot
Rubber molded cleats are lightweight yet durable
Flashy metallic coloring provides a unique look
cons: Some athletes commented that this shoe runs small, so ordering a size up is a good idea

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like these, they keep me in control. I will say, however, I have wide feet and I feel that these are very narrow. I've tried two different types of laces in them and I can still feel pressure on the very top and sides of my feet. I bought a half size larger than my normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these cleats 3 to 4 times now and am very satisfied. Quality is good, fitting is good, no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: TheAccountant

customer_reviews.title: A poorly constructed, defective product in our experience
customer_reviews.text: A terrible product...my son is a serious baseball player, and as soon as he tried to wear them while playing neither strap would hold, they came off constantly. We will be returning the product. Our advice: stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, only bad is no loop holes past ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, only bad is no loop holes past low ankle, if you have thick ankles you might need to drill two more holes for more snug fit. Velcro might night clasp tight enough for some
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Young

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfy a little narrow. The top strap needs to be 1 inch longer. I am 5 10 and 190 so I am not a real big guy.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Gafner

customer_reviews.title: As Depicted.
customer_reviews.text: They ran a little bit smaller/narrower than expected even though I have wide feet, but I did oder them a half size bigger to compensate. After breaking in it should be fine
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L

customer_reviews.title: Fits to size
customer_reviews.text: Great product, shoe fits to size. They look better in person compared to the picture, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Frankv19

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Supportive
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. They are comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: JWeck

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cleats! My son really likes them. Fit well. Comfortable. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Holman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good cleats. Velcro strap is a little short on material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ankle support is good. They do seem narrow for a men’s shoe... size is true
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats
customer_reviews.text: I play men’s softball these perfect they grab really good and great support on my ankle
customer_reviews.author: priscilla barcenas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Other gift for my son thank you fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Under Armour Boys' Harper 2 RM Baseball Shoe
product_meta.description: Molded synthetic upper provides dependable support & a comfortable fit . Adjustable ankle strap locks you in with powerful stability & support. Full-length EVA midsole helps disperse cleat pressure for added comfort & cushioning. Rubber molded cleats provide optimal traction & durability on all field types. Weight: 12.7 oz.
feature_bullets: Molded synthetic upper provides dependable support & a comfortable fit
Adjustable ankle strap locks you in with powerful stability & support
Full length EVA midsole helps disperse cleat pressure for added comfort & cushioning
Rubber molded cleats provide optimal traction & durability on all field types
